info.title: PitchBook API [Companies]
info.description: API for retrieving company data based on specific criteria.

get.description: Retrieves companies matching the specified search criteria.

parameters.name: companyNames
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of company names, IDs, websites, or tickers.

parameters.name: ownershipStatus
parameters.description: Filter companies by ownership status. e.g. PVTB = private with backing | ACQ = Acquired/Merged | PVTNB Privately Held (no backing)

parameters.name: backingStatus
parameters.description: Filter companies by backing status. e.g. PEB = pe-backed | VCB = vc-backed | ACCIB: accelerator/incubator-backed

parameters.name: businessStatus
parameters.description: Filter companies by business status. .e.g STAR = startup

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: Filter companies by cities. Accepts multiple comma-separated values (e.g., 'Berlin,London').

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of country codes (e.g., USA, GBR, DEU, IND).

parameters.name: postCode
parameters.description: Filter companies by postal code. (e.g. 10245)

parameters.name: dateFounded
parameters.description: Filter companies by date founded using operators (>, <, ^). Format: >YYYY-MM-DD. e.g. >2020-01-01

parameters.name: dealType
parameters.description: Filter companies by deal type.

parameters.name: dealDate
parameters.description: Filter companies by deal date using operators (>, <, ^). Format: >YYYY-MM-DD. e.g. >2020-01-01

parameters.name: totalRaised
parameters.description: Find companies by total amount raised IN MILLIONS. Use the '>' operator for more than a certain value, or '<' for less than a certain value (e.g., '>2' for more than 2 million).

parameters.name: revenue
parameters.description: Find companies by revenue in millions using a range. Specify the range with two values separated by '^'. For example, '1^50' for revenue between 1 and 50 million.

parameters.name: industry
parameters.description: Industry codes. For 'Leisure and Hospitality', use '205040,205050' (where 205040 represents Leisure Facilities and 205050 represents Restaurants and Bars).

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Fixed value for the number of results per page.

parameters.name: companyId
